players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was found dead on the first night. Let's stay vigilant and work together to uncover who among us might be working with the mafia."

Diana: "Diana is not the mafia! Alice's accusation is baseless and meant to mislead us. Let's focus on finding real clues instead of throwing random accusations."

You: "Diana has to be the mafia. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. We can't afford to waste time; arresting her now is the only way to protect the town."
